name: A Fae's Curse
description:
My entry for the SodorJam 2022 with the theme "Death is a New Beginning". This follows the origins of one of my original characters, Jayfa!

Browser Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Z - Confirm / Enter

X - Cancel

Credits:

Sodor - Music, Art, Programming

TofuPixel - Moonlight GB palette

SomePx - Fonts

Extra Credits:

Special thanks to the GB Studio community. Without their helpful tips and tutorials, this game would not be possible!

Special thanks to my community members on Twitch and Discord for the support and for participating in this Game Jam!

Special thanks to YOU for checking out my work!
